page.title: 16St Annes - Council Meeting.
page.content: 1. {The Removal of Wind-Blown Sand {Off the Highway.}The council have indicated they are prepared to spend a sum of Â£9,000 to try to remove the annual bulk of sand that has drifted onto the highway. 2. {Proposals For Safer Cycling In St {Annes.}St Annes Safe Cycling Campaign Group have proposed better cycling in St Annes with the establishement of cycleways .The committee agrees in improving safety though cycleways have not been supported. 3.{Fundays,FairHaven Lake 3&4 Aug. '85 A promotional weekend at FairHaven Lake all free transport between Lytham/St Annes and FairHaven in connection with the event. 4.{Redevelopment of St Annes station} Redevelopment of the British Rail site at St Annes and regulation of car parking.
